EmailTemplate.name: Global_Website_Kroger_Learn More_Q418.Kroger Learn More Q418 Form Email
EmailTemplate.subject: How to partner with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As the fine people at Kroger can attest to, partnering with Pivotal can help your organization implement modern development practices and build higher quality software faster.
See for yourself how other customers <[[https://pivotal.io/customers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=kroger-learn-more-q418]]>—like Kroger—are working with Pivotal to digitally transform. You can also read How Pivotal is Helping Retailers Improve the In-Store Experience Through Better Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-pivotal-is-helping-retailers-improve-the-in-store-experience-through-better-software?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=kroger-learn-more-q418]]> blog post or check out this episode from our That Moment podcast, "When you’re doing the right thing, people want to help <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/when-you-re-doing-the-right-thing-people-want-to-help?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=kroger-learn-more-q418]]>.”
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can enable your cloud journey, don’t hesitate to reach out to us. <[[https://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=kroger-learn-more-q418]]>
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
